description.narrative: The objective of the project is to foster greater integration in the Changsha-Zhuzhou-Xiangtan (CZT) Region of Hunan Provincethrough support for a carefully selected set of priority investments to address specific regional needs in a sustainable manner.

provider-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development

condition.narrative: Adoption of EMP/RAP for Shaoyaogang - Xiang Gang section of Corridor component in Xiangtan Urban
O&M Plan, including for Corridor component
Official approval for Zhaoshan Scenic Area Works
Waste disposal plan for solid waste from Zhuzhou Clean Coal Company

title.narrative: Institutional strengthening and Implementation Assistance - Cumulative awarded contracts

comment.narrative: All TA contracts have been awarded.

title.narrative: Foster greater economic integration in the CZT Region

target.value: 2 meetings annually to discuss CZT economic integration issues.

comment.narrative: Many more meetings have been held at the regional level this year.

title.narrative: Changsha wastewater - Percentage sewage treated in Changsha

comment.narrative: Original target has been met through the construction of a wastewater plant with a capacity of 120,000 m3/day. The end targetwillhave to be revised as more wastewater treatment plants are being constructed in Changsha and the capacity of the Bankconstructed treatment plant is also being expanded. The new targets will be established during the next mission when additionaldetails are available on the other treatment plants being constructed.

title.narrative: Institutional Strengthening and Implementation Assistance - CZT EIO Management: Recommendations (r), approvals (a), and implementation/opertion (i/o)

comment.narrative: The final target was 5 I/O which was met in 2010.

title.narrative: Institutional strengthening and Implementation Assistance for CMDC - Recommendations (R), Approvals (A), and Implementation/Operation (I/O)

comment.narrative: The final target was 5 I/O which was met in 2010.

title.narrative: Corridor component - Length of embankment strengthened to required standard

comment.narrative: The target value is revised from 72 to 55 km for 2010, and 61.4km for 2012. This was due to the fact that embankment to bestrengthened is 61.4km; and the length of road to be constructed on top of the dyke is 72 km.

title.narrative: Corridor component - Length of scenic road constructed

comment.narrative: While only 38.4km have been completely finished and are operational, almost all remaining works are either final asphalt layer orsigns.
